name: Destroiders
description:
A fresh, exciting take on the old retro space shooter, born from the love for arcade gaming. Destroiders will keep you on your toes in this fast-paced, space drifter. There is no rest when deciding whether to destroy your mate and steal his resources or mine your own before facing bloodthirsty space monsters and alien ships waiting to crush your puny little dreams.

Game Play

Destroiders is a 2.5D skill-based Asteroids-inspired shoot ‘em up. Drift around destroying, avoiding and harvesting asteroids. Use your shield to bounce off hurtling obstacles and protect yourself from incoming fire.


Play either on your own or with your mates in coop/ comp multiplayer. In Coop mode, see how many points you and your teammates can collect before the round ends, or play competitively and humiliate the other teams by reaching the final round with the most points or knocking them out early.

Features:

  • Up to 4 teams and an unlimited number of players (More players, more pc power)
  • Choice from a selection of distinct environments
  • Single player or cooperative/competitive multiplayer (Couch Coop Only)
  • Simple drifting game with increasing difficulty with each level
  • Online and Local Leader board for cooperative mode
  • 4 types of deadly weapons at your disposal
  • Protect yourself with your shield
  • Encounter numerous alien species

4 Weapon Types at your disposal:

  • 1. Laser Gun
  • 2. Gatling Gun
  • 3. Mine Deployer
  • 4. Rocket Launcher

4 alien species that will make your life a misery:

  • Screamer
  • Gobbler
  • UFO
  • Sawer
